revised_title: Discovery and Extraction of Thallium from Pyrites
tldr: The author, William Crookes, discusses his research on thallium, a newly discovered element found in iron pyrites. He explains his attempts to extract thallium from various sources, including deposits from oil-of-vitriol works and ores. Crookes also describes the use of spectroscopy in detecting thallium in minerals and shares his findings on the distribution of thallium in different regions and ores.
